text: @JoeBiden Thanks @JoeBiden.@realDonaldTrump is a conman, liar, and buffoon. Just listening to his voice sickens me. We're pleased some people returned to work after some states reopened during #COVID19 but we have paid a heavy price as cases/deaths rise. Unemployment still 11.4%.#TrumpFail https://t.co/WifIO5dYAh

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
